presentation:
My name is Elouan Le Merle.
I'm currently a student at BUT Informatic at Bordeaux
aboutMeText:
I'm a student in my 2nd year of BUT Informatique at the University of Bordeaux (BAC +3) and I'm interested in Web development and video games.
I started developing quite young, interested in the freedom it brings via the possibility of transforming my ideas into concrete projects.
I'm curious and like to discover new things, even outside IT, such as sports (skateboarding, surfing) and instruments (guitar) by learning on my own.
I like to carry out small personal projects alongside my studies.
